data.oai_dc:dc: Leaf litter species comparisons, Figure 2Raw leaf mass data from leaf species experiment in Brazil.Table headings:Brom_capacity_ml – Maximum water holding capacity of bromeliadLeaf_Sp – Leaf Species identified by genus Mesh – Mesh size of leaf packsM0_g – Starting dry leaf massMt_g – Final dry leaf mass (experiment duration 30 days)
